scripts.build:bs:dev: sass --load-path=node_modules --quiet-deps src/my-bootstrap5/index.scss dist/my-bootstrap5.css && postcss --config src/my-bootstrap5 dist/my-bootstrap5.css -o dist/my-bootstrap5.css
scripts.build:bs:prod: sass --load-path=node_modules --quiet-deps --style=compressed src/my-bootstrap5/index.scss dist/my-bootstrap5.min.css --no-source-map && postcss --config src/my-bootstrap5 dist/my-bootstrap5.min.css -o dist/my-bootstrap5.min.css
scripts.build:bs: npm run build:bs:dev && npm run build:bs:prod
